Text saved: Ed's long walk was not possible without modern tools. He used a radio to ask the people who lived in the rainforest for food, and he also asked them if he could cross their land. Many of these people came to meet him and showed him the way through the most difficult ground. While he walked, Ed wrote a blog where he wrote down his daily experiences. He used the interest from the news about his trip to speak out against the damage to the rainforest and to collect money for charities that help nature and children in Brazil and Peru.
